title: Enhancing Healthcare Practical Skills: Simulation/VR-Based Training Through Personalized Learning Material Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners perform social decision-making simulations with 85% or higher accuracy using multimedia materials applying personalization principles.
Learners successfully apply conflict management strategies at least three times based on personalized feedback in VR-based scenarios.
Learners demonstrate a 20% or greater improvement in social interaction competencies through pre-post assessment comparisons at the course conclusion.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
